name: Cool Note10 Launcher for Galaxy Note,S,A -Theme UI
description: Cool Note10 Launcher is a cool style of Galaxy Note10 launcher with many valuable features and many configurations.   Who will get value from Cool Note10 Launcher? 1. People who has a bit old phones and want to make their phone look modern, just try this Cool Note10 Launcher, need not flash Rom 2. People who has Galaxy J/A/C/S series devices or other brands devices and want to experience Galaxy Note10, just try this Cool Note10 Launcher 3. People who has Galaxy Note series devices and want more new, cool features from launcher than One UI launcher, just try this Cool Note10 Launcher   Notice for users:  + Android is a registered trademark of Google, Inc.  + Cool Note10 Launcher is inspired by Galaxy Note10 Launcher, it is NOT official Samsung Galaxy Note10 Launcher, it is built by Cool Launcher App Team.   Cool Note10 Launcher features: + Support Most Phones: Note10 Launcher can be installed and used in ALL the Android 4.0+ devices, amazing + Themes and Wallpapers: Note10 Launcher has many beautiful launcher themes and wallpapers in online store + Drawer Style: horizontal, vertical, category, or list drawer + Gestures: swipe gesture, pinch gesture, two fingers gesture + Icon Pack: Note10 Launcher support almost all icon pack made by third-party  + Video Wallpaper, Live Wallpaper, very cool + Hide Apps, or lock the hidden apps + App Lock, protect privacy + Flash Call, very cool animation effect when call incoming + Round Corner Screen, make your phone like full screen phone + Battery Saver, Booster built-in launcher + Color Mode: light launcher mode, dark launcher mode, automatic mode + Unread Notifier shown on launcher desktop icon + Change launcher icon size, launcher grid size + Launcher desktop transition effect + T9 search in launcher desktop + Note10 Launcher support change font + Support multi dock pages + Dock background option + Folder color, folder style option + Many other launcher features, just install and try Cool Note10 Launcher!  Permission required: (We take care your privacy, for detail , please refer to privacy policy) 1. Location: needed by Weather Widget 2. Camera: needed by Torch feature 3. Access photos, media: needed to manage themes & wallpapers in theme store  If you like, please rate Cool Note10 Launcher, you are helping us making Cool Note10/Note9 Launcher better and better for all users, great thanks!
